Source/Translation: Περαιτέρω βελτίωση της τοποθεσίας των υπηρεσιών με την αντιστοίχιση αιτημάτων χαμηλής προτεραιότητας μόνο με κτίρια υπηρεσιών εντός της ίδιας περιφέρειας (ή εκτός οποιασδήποτε περιοχής). Μόλις ένα ανεκπλήρωτο αίτημα γίνει υψηλή προτεραιότητα, θα εξυπηρετείται από οποιαδήποτε προσφορά της κοντινής υπηρεσίας, όμως. Επηρεάζει: σκουπίδια, αστυνομία, υγειονομική περίθαλψη, συντήρηση, ταχυδρομείο, ταξί.

Περιορίστε τις υπηρεσίες στις τοπικές περιοχές ταιριάζοντας τις αιτήσεις χαμηλής προτεραιότητας μόνο με τα κτίρια υπηρεσιών στην ίδια περιοχή. Μόλις ένα ανεκπλήρωτο αίτημα γίνει υψηλή προτεραιότητα, θα επιτρέπεται να εξυπηρετείται από οποιαδήποτε προσφορά υπηρεσιών σε κοντινή απόσταση.

Προειδοποίηση: Αυτή είναι μια ισχυρή επιλογή, παρακαλώ βεβαιωθείτε ότι έχετε καθορισμένες περιοχές για κάθε μια από τις περιοχές σας και να έχουν διαθέσιμες υπηρεσίες σε αυτές τις περιοχές πριν ενεργοποιήσετε αυτή την επιλογή.
This option will match incoming warehouse offers early in the matching process which will result in most goods transfers occurring through warehouses.
Reserve warehouse cargo trucks for local transfers
Recommended to enable with Warehouse First: reserve a percentage of warehouse truck capacity for satisfying city demand, prevents all trucks being used for export.

Αυτή η επιλογή θα μειώσει την προτεραιότητα προσφοράς όταν ο αριθμός των υπόλοιπων φορτηγών είναι μικρότερος από αυτό το ποσοστό. Το οποίο έχει ως αποτέλεσμα την κράτηση χωρητικότητας φορτηγών για την ικανοποίηση τοπικής ζήτησης υψηλής προτεραιότητας.
This option allows inter-warehouse transfers to occur at lower priorities but checks the storage levels to ensure warehouses don't aimlessly send goods back and forth for no benefit.
This option will match incoming factory offers early in the matching process to ensure factories are matched with the closest available offer for improved operation.

By default Cemeteries, Garbage and Police Stations send out a transfer offer for one vehicle at a time. This option changes the offer to be the number of available vehicles, which can result in improved matching.\r\nIt now also increases offer priority when less than 1/2 of vehicles are in use.
Show issues with vehicles on route
Επαναφορά Όλων Των Ρυθμίσεων Του Διαχειριστή Μεταφοράς
Reserve warehouse cargo trucks for local transfers
Warning: These settings require the Custom Transfer Manager to be enabled.
Show issues with vehicles on route
Maximum allowed matching distance, 0 = Unlimited. Imports/Exports are not affected.
VehicleAI enhances vehicles to look for close by issues to resolve.
Please ensure you have sufficient internal production before disabling these resources.
The game adds dummy traffic to make the city feel more alive. This option blocks dummy traffic transfers to reduce traffic within the city.
0 = Use global setting\r\n1 = No change to distance\r\n10 = 10x Further away
These multipliers are applied to the calculated distance in the match algorithm to make the connection seem further away and hence less likely to be chosen as a match.
0 = Use global setting, if any or no restriction.\r\n1+ = Maximum match distance
Choose which offer to match first when incoming and outging offers have the same priority.

Use path distance instead of line of sight distance. This will result in better matches where your network or geography is complex but is slower so please ensure your computer is fast enough for this option.
Look for vehicles that are stuck or without valid positions or status and release them.
Find path units that have not been released correctly but are not used and release them properly.

While the building panel is open, this option will color each node to show whether they are connected or not according to the Transfer Manager algorithm. Nodes with the same color are connected, differently colored nodes are not.
The vanilla sick handler tends to leave quite a few sick citizens uncollected. This option overrides the vanilla sick handler with a custom handler to hopefully improve this behaviour.
The vanilla game only collects sick citizens from residential buildings. For more realism and better hospital usage sick citizens can also be collected from other building types as well.
Warning: Enabling this option on an existing city will result in a surge of sick citizen collection which may tax your hospital system.
Vanilla warehouse offers are limited to priority 2, this option will allow them to scale to priority 7.

Highlight Mode: Matches

Key
Red: Selected Building
Magenta: Services
Cyan: Raw Materials
Blue: Goods
Green: Mail
Yellow: Everything else

Highlight Mode: Issues

Key
Red: Selected Building
Cyan and Gold: Low Priority
Blue and Orange: High Priority
Green: Other service buildings for this issue type

If your outside connections are getting over worked, you can use this setting to limit the number of vehicles that each building can allocate to exporting.\r\n0% = No Export Allowed\r\n100% = Unrestricted

The generic industries handler tends to request a lot of material very urgently which can generate a lot of truck traffic and hog the available material. This handler attempts to correct these issues.
This option will write out log files for each match set for the chosen reason. Warning: This produces a significant performance penalty, please only enable for trouble shooting purposes.
Detect path failures and block any further matches between these failed objects for a while.
The path distance algorithm can use a heuristic to speed up the calculation, but this heuristic can reduce the accuracy of choosing the closest match in some situations.

The path distance algorithm adjusts the travel time of the last segment of an outside connection, within the algorithm, to allow applying the outside connection multipliers. By changing this value you can adjust the underlying base value that is applied to these segments.
Select Building or Enter Building ID
This option makes the Taxi Stand the hub for taxi's rather than the depot. This means taxi's will now wait at stands near an airport or busy tourist district rather than be hidden at a taxi depot.

Add a small delay before a taxi, that is waiting at a stand, will make a taxi offer. This stops taxis from constantly arriving at a taxi stand then immediately being dispatched to pick up another citizen.
